title: Indiana and Miami Play for College Football Championship
summary: On Monday, Indiana and Miami will play a big football game for the college championship. This is a surprise because Indiana was not expected to be so good, but now they are undefeated and strong. Miami wants to win again like they did in the past, and they are playing at home. The game is exciting because both teams have interesting stories. Also, college football is changing with players and coaches moving to new teams and athletes getting paid money. A sports writer named Ralph Russo talks about the game and how Indiana became so good quickly. This article helps us understand what to watch in the championship.

background_read: College football is a popular sport in the United States where university teams compete. The championship game is the biggest event of the season to crown the best team. Teams like Indiana and Miami have long histories, with Miami known for past successes. Recently, college sports have seen changes with players able to transfer more easily and earn money from their name and image. This article discusses an upcoming championship game between two surprising teams and the broader changes in the sport.
Article_Structure: WHO: Indiana and Miami football teams, Ralph Russo (sports writer)
WHAT: They are playing a championship game for college football
WHY: To decide the best team and discuss changes in college football

perspectives.description: The game is thrilling because of unexpected teams and their stories.
